intro: Psychotria neozenkeri, commonly known as the Zambian Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical Africa, particularly found in the Democratic Republic of the Congo and Zambia. The plant is characterized by its elliptical, dark green leaves and produces small, white or pale yellow flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria neozenkeri is noted for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated for its foliage.
